basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Fernando SimÃµes and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in programing started back in 2010 when I started making apps for graphing calculators that helped solving certain problems. Since then I've learned using different technologies for web-development, both back-end and front-end. My goal is to build high-performance apps that solve real-world problems and give users an awesome experience.

projects.title: Insects Classification App
projects.description: Mobile Application to classify diferent types of insects. Made with AndroidStudio, Firebase and Google maps API. Allows the user to take photos of insects and classify them, also allows the user to save the the location where the insect was found using google maps API.

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: Aplication to browse movies, check ratings and actors. Made using React and Javascript

projects.title: 2D Java Game
projects.description: Game made with Java using the MVC structure and Object oriented program paragdigm.
